# Request for Proposal: Mechanical Services - Lethbridge Research and Development Centre

## Procurement Details

* Tender Title: Mechanical Services - Lethbridge Research and Development Centre
* Tender Reference Number: cb-666-54899148
* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: 01R11-24-C033A
* Publication Date: 2023-10-17
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-14T12:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-11-14
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-12-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-11-30
* Tender Status: Expired

## Notice Details

* Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Distribution Language: English and French
* Sole Distributor: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada

## Background and Objectives

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s Lethbridge Research and Development Centre requires a contractor to provide mechanical services on an "as and when requested basis." The services will be delivered at the Centre, located at 5403 1st Avenue South, Lethbridge, AB. The contractor will be required to provide a wide range of mechanical services, including heating and cooling and air conditioning HVAC installation and maintenance service.

## Security Requirements

Access to the work site is restricted and requires a valid RELIABILITY STATUS granted or approved by AAFC.

## Evaluation Criteria

* Mandatory Technical Requirements: Compliance with the requirement of bid solicitation and meeting all mandatory technical evaluation criteria
* Basis of Selection: Responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price

## Submission Instructions

Submissions must be electronically transmitted using the CPC Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation. They should be submitted to the AAFC Bid Receiving Unit by the tender closing date and time:

aafc.procbidreceiving-receptiondesoumissionaprov.aac@agr.gc.ca

## Related Documents and Information

The bid solicitation documents, including additional information and procedures, are available for download from the Canada Buys website under "Solicitation Opportunities".
